title: Warrior of the Myst II
description: There’s a rogue Warrior of the Myst out there going by the name of “Ghost” and no one knows just who this dark entity actually is. One thing is certain however – Ghost seeks to kill all who were responsible for the death of King Rigel III several months ago. Unfortunately, Ghost has some curious beliefs regarding that murder – beliefs that suggest that Valhalla’s current king, Mercer Knight, may have been responsible for that attack on Castle Mount. How do you battle against a powerful Myst Warrior who believes that they are already dead… merely a ghost of a person who is stuck between the world of the living and the world of the dead?  *This second Warrior of the Myst novel is written in the universe of the Colonization Saga by Scott McElhaney*  Editorial Reviews:  "McElhaney's story telling is deft, well-paced, and with an ear for conversation" ~ Beacon Journal Book Review  "The author does a good job of sucking you into the moment and feeling as if you are the main character. The technology and scenarios are realistic enough for this sci fi fan and if you like a good storyteller Mr. McElhaney knows how to do it." ~Top 50 Amazon Reviewer and Vine Voice Michael Gallagher.  This companion to the Colonization Saga is brought to you by the author of the international bestselling novel “The Mystic Saga”. Scott McElhaney has been bringing science fiction to Kindle-readers at reasonable prices for four years now, including the bestsellers Dominion, Ghosts of Ophidian, Beyond the Event Horizon, Alastair, Erinyes, and Vestige.  Over 250,000 copies have been downloaded worldwide.
author: Scott McElhaney
